name: Air meets Water
description: Base of a cedar wood plank, carved with additional inlaid composite created from aluminium, animal bone ash and graphite. Three vertical carved cedar wood scultpures on steel dowelling pedestals, two are painted. Three vertical sculptures include carved representations of a raven, eagle, orca with coppers in beak of raven and copper wings on the eagle.

name: Kaleidoscope eye
description: Kaleidoscope eye painting by Luke & Morgan Choice/AvantForm

name: Independence Monument
description: The Independence Monument is a victory column located on Maidan Nezalezhnosti (Independence Square) in Kyiv, commemorating the independence of Ukraine in 1991. A spiral staircase is contained within the column

name: Dancing in the street
description: Fusion of artistic works (hand painting, Indian inks and acrylic painting + digital work, texture varnish ...) creating unique, matte and glossy texture effects.

name: Hearts and a Watercolor
description: Eight hearts with various decorations. 1969 Etching and watercolour on Chrisbrook handmade paper

name: Courage My Love
description: Moon's Daughter had never been so far from home; she wished for glimpses of her father's crescent smile. 'Courage, my love.' said Fox, 'Even in shadow, I see pockets of moonlight in your eyes'. Story excerpt from 'Courage, My Love' by Liam McKinnon.

name: Rhapsody
description: Rhapsody artist proof etching by Keith Mallett

name: Tiny bunny love
description: Clay bunnies. They make me smile, and you? Happy coding everyone!

name: Sunflowers
description: The sunflower paintings had a special significance for Van Gogh: they communicated ‘gratitude’

name: Wheatfield with Crows
description: The menacing sky, the crows and the dead-end path are said to refer to the end of his life approaching.

name: Almond Blossoms
description: Large blossom branches like this against a blue sky were one of Van Gogh’s favourite subjects.

name: Starry Night
description: Painted in June 1889, it depicts the view from the east-facing window of his asylum room at Saint-Rémy-de-Provence, just before sunrise, with the addition of an imaginary village.

name: Woman with a Parasol
description: The Impressionist work depicts his wife Camille Monet and their son Jean Monet in the period from 1871 to 1877 while they were living in Argenteuil, capturing a moment on a stroll on a windy summer's day.[

name: Impression, Sunrise
description: It depicts the port of Le Havre, Monet's hometown.

name: San Giorgio Maggiore at Dusk
description: It depicts mysterious buildings that seem to magically appear from the surrounding landscape, they almost seem to float in the background.

name: The Woman in the Green Dress
description: The portrait shows Monet's future wife, Camille Doncieux, wearing a green dress and jacket.

name: Luncheon on the Grass
description: The painting in its whole form shows twelve people. They are clothed in Parisian clothing which was fashionable at that time. They are having a picnic in near a forest glade.
